page.title: 13Farming
page.content: Of the 16 farms in our block some are farmed by the same owner e.g Hill Home Farm & Hill Farm are owned by M.B Hunter.Most of the farms are basically arable farms.However some keep a suckling herd a fatten steers e.g Mr Batho.There are now no diary herds. A few farms keep pigs but these have declined conciderably in number.The mostimportant crops are Winter Wheat & Winter barley.A few of the farms grow Sugar Beet.Beans & Oil Seed Rape are grown as break crops.Grass is grown for hay & silage where cattle are fattened.
